name: Sepa
description:
Super Electronical Payment Account

- a shmup with CanardPC and Bolloré -

This game was made in 48hours for the contest "Make Something Horrible" of CanardPC.

"A piece of art" JVC

Bolloré Approved Game

Level designer : Naej Doree

Artworks : klmp200

Sound design : klmp200 & Donald Trump

[shmup/simulation]
